website_summaries.verdict: With the included buffer pad and the ability to remove scratches using a dual-action orbital polisher or simple elbow grease, scratches don't stand a chance.
pros: An excellent scratch remover with a buffer pad
Use with buffer pad or dual-action orbital polisher
Most customers reported success when treating swirls and scratches
Many customers were able to remove paint from colliding with other vehicles
cons: This scratch remover won't work with scratches deep enough to damage the paint

customer_reviews.title: Works for light scratches
customer_reviews.text: Really does get rid of light scratches. If you can feel the scratch with your fingernail it won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for black vehicles.
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! 06 Black Dodge. Paint not very well taken care of by first owner. I used this product and then some wax(not by trinova, sorry) my brother stopped by and thought I had repainted the truck. This product is a must for black vehicles. Also would like to note , I’m not good with machine buffers, used this product with good ol elbow grease.
customer_reviews.author: J. Case

customer_reviews.title: ... the first time I had ever attempted a project like this and I was able to get great results ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I had ever attempted a project like this and I was able to get great results without any special tools. I just used the polishing pad included, a microfiber towel and some high grit sand paper for the tougher spots. Everything worked out well. I finished the job with turtle wax polish. The pictures speak for themselves. This stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: TEXAS95

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money at the auto body shop!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and results! I turned too sharp in a parking ramp and my back door scrapped along a purple pillar in the ramp. This happened a good year ago and never got around to taking care of the ugliness. My husband gave me so much crap and I came across to this product, read the reviews, and ordered. It only took me about 20 minutes to get my “after” results. It did, however take a lot of elbow grease. Ladies, don’t waste your time and money at the dealership. This product saved me over $500!
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Got bright yellow paint off black suv
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally hit a yellow pole pulling into an alley way in the city. Had HUGE yellow paint mark across the front of my black SUVs bumper. Using this and some elbow grease you wouldn’t even know I had hit the pole. Note: when I hit the pole I did not actually scratch the bumper of my car, more as the paint from the pole hit hard enough to rub off on my car- I don’t know how well this would’ve worked had I actually scratched the cars paint itself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely made scratches invisible
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with this product. I’m always skeptical of things like this that say they’ll perfectly fix scratches. I was worried because I randomly found 3 visible scratches on my front bumper. I could feel the scratch with my hand so I figured it was too deep. Well this product totally fixed it. As I was drying off the product I literally couldn’t even tell where the scratches were. Would totally recommend trying this first before anything else. Wish I took a before and after but wasn’t expecting it to be good enough for one.
customer_reviews.author: Tom V Weekes

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help remove, or at least diminish, some scratches on my car from coming too close to a white pillar in a parking garage. I read through all of the reviews, and decided to give it a try. I did NOT purchase the clay that was recommended by the seller because I thought it might require more expertise than I have, and I didn't want to ruin the finish of my car. Simply put, the product is excellent! The minor scratches were completely removed without damage. The deeper scratches can still be seen, but are greatly diminished. I am happy with my results.
customer_reviews.author: college mom

customer_reviews.title: Removed paint, very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had bunch of minor scratches on front of my mother’s car and try this one since 100% satisfaction guaranteed. First, it look like working like a charm and I got really excited... and took picture to do let people know how awesome this is. But, look at second pic.. It removed the paint and now I need to spent a lot more money to repair this damage... I am so upset and very disappointed. I would not recommend it for it
customer_reviews.author: OperaGeek

customer_reviews.title: Be patient with it. It takes some work.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not some magic cream where you only gently wipe it on your car and it magically makes your problems go away—you still have to put some work into it. It worked great, and I’m glad I got this instead of trying to fix it my way, which would have probably made my car look worse, or take it somewhere that would have charged me a ridiculous amount of money for it. I still have to work on it a bit, but the pictures uploaded are only twenty minutes after working with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: Based on the 'honest' reviews, I bought this product. Needless to say, scrubbed and scrubbed my scratches on my car and nothing happened. These scratches were nothing big or deep either people. The only scratches that came off were scratches I could have rubbed off using water. Honestly, this stuff is probably hand cream since it looks exactly like it 😑 and Im actually pretty pissed that I could have bought some Jager instead to numb the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: I had a few noticeable fine scratches on the hood of my truck that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a few noticeable fine scratches on the hood of my truck that I tried this Trinova Scratch and Swirl remover on and it worked. I no longer have to be annoyed every time I approach my vehicle from the front! It didn't take a lot of effort to get it back to looking like new again. I will use it again in the future if necessary. I'm glad that I didn't pay someone at the body shop to try to buff the scratches out, I saved a bunch of money with this!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Walton

customer_reviews.title: Auto Detailer in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic! My truck had swirl marks from a previous owner. This black bottle brought depth,shine, amd smoothness back to my truck for a steal of a price!!! Trinova you did it again! All your products i tried are top notch and you'll always have a special place in my inventory.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McGruder

customer_reviews.title: This product is extraordinary!
customer_reviews.text: This product is extraordinary! I read other reviews and decided to give it a try. I wish I had taken before and after pix to show how amazingly it worked on my rear driver’s side door which almost looked like it had been keyed! I thought the scratches were going to be too deep but this product got them out — no problem. I was able to remove most of the incidental scratches and swirls on the whole car (mostly from going to the car wash) quickly and easily. Saved hundreds of dollars from what an auto body shop would charge. I was not paid for this review.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyBroad

customer_reviews.title: Great for surface scratches!
customer_reviews.text: I scraped my mirror to the driverway wall. I was able to clean out most of the scratches, as it is not as notisable as before In only 1 min and using only few drops
customer_reviews.author: A. Ounanians

customer_reviews.title: It’s not good it’s not working waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it It’s not good it’s not working waste of money I wish I could get a refund if possible and send back the product Very unhappy with it didn’t do anything to the scratch smell like in the picture and description
customer_reviews.author: Florin Cioara

customer_reviews.title: My truck looks way better
customer_reviews.text: After running my truck thru the soft touch car wash multiple times out here in ND it left a lot of scratches along the sides. I read the reviews on this product and thought I'd give it a try. I used little 6" orbital polisher with it and was very pleased with the results I got. Of course it didn't remove the major stuff that went thru the paint but it did a very nice job on the surface scratches. Plan to use it on my 72 Lincoln Continental when I get back home.
customer_reviews.author: royalty

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work for our car
customer_reviews.text: We have a Hyundai Tucson and it simply didn't work for us, with minor scratches, we saw reviews for other customers and it seems it works with some cars but definitely it doesn't work it our own, kind of disappointed in fact.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Smith

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product because our car had soooo many swirls and a few scratches. My hubby was skeptical. But I read all the rave reviews and decided to give it a go. WOW! Our black car looks fantabulous! Hubby was impressed! We will most definitely be purchasing this again and will recommend it to anyone looking for such a product. We did use an orbital pad to apply it and then an orbital buffer to shine it.
customer_reviews.author: Derwyn Howells

customer_reviews.title: Promising, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: My black Mazda has been through some rough roads in the PNW - and, as a result, got a lot of scratches. I tried this product and followed the manufacturer's suggestion: first cleaning with their Clay Bar kit, then applying this with the included pad. Many of the smaller scratches are now mostly gone, but others are still visible. I believe using a rotary tool would provide better results, and I'm hoping to try that later on. I'd give this a 3.5 stars, but since it's not available sticking to 3 for now - and hoping to update it to 4/5 if the power tools work.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Zouain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results with small abrasions
customer_reviews.text: The picture isn't awesome but you get the idea. This product when meticulously rubbed in small circles over scratches either eliminated them or made them significantly less noticeable. The truck went off roading recently and acquired a plethora or microabrasions and some deep scratches. For $20 it's a great deal. A little dab goes a long way and if you have the time and patience you can get a new paint look with this. It won't solve world hunger or major gouges, but it def is a wiz with microabrasions.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaR

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned the glass stove top too!
customer_reviews.text: Got my scratch remover yesterday and gave it a try on the car. It did a nice job of removing some fine scratches. As I was sitting there later in the day and looking at my scratched glass top stove, I decided to try it on that too. What did I have to lose? Turned out good too! Removed a lot of the fine scratches and really did a good job of cleaning the top! I would recommend for your car (and glass stove top too!) Stainless steel appliances, I'm coming for you next!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ringel

customer_reviews.title: My go-to scratch concealer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this stuff really works, wondering if it lasts. Had 3 noticeable scratches on dark blue door and they could be felt. This product did not visibly damage the clear coat on the metallic paint, and it concealed the scratches to the point they are not readily noticeable. I even used it on another area that I had used a different, more abrasive rubbing compound that dulled the finish and this product helped re-blend so not nearly as noticeable. They are correct, for really deep scratches won't work, but for the door scratches I had worked great. Worth a try, would buy and use again.
customer_reviews.author: road_warrior

customer_reviews.title: Only for paint transfer
customer_reviews.text: I had my car valet parked and they must have rubbed up against one of the garage walls because I had white paint transfer (with no scratches) on my front bumper. I didn't notice until I got home and they never responded to me about getting it fixed. I saw this and figured I may as well try it out since they weren't doing anything to help. It worked very well! The paint transfer came off pretty easily. NOTE: This isn't for scratches! It is only for surface damage that hasn't broken the clear coat! I highly recommend using this for minor surface blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: AbKap4

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing My husband calls it the miracle magic eraser!!! Someone scratched my car while parked from both sides, I really take care of it and try no to park on crowded places or park far away, but still there is always someone who doesn't care about it and have no respect for other people stuff. This product erased the scratches completely it looks like it never happened in the first place, if the damage is in the surface of the paint this will definitely work, 100% guaranteed. Mi car looks awesome again I don't feel angry every time I see it.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre At Best
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. I'm not a car fenatic so I won't pretend I know everything about fixing cars but this product didn't even get close to my expectations. It can remove small scrapes that may have discolored the paint a little. But anything deeper than a finger nail scratch will stay exactly as is. I would say this is a glorified dirt remover. Will be returning and not pruchasing again. Be warned!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for very, very light scratches
customer_reviews.text: So I used this on light, medium, and deep scratches. For the most part, it improved the appearance of light scratches by at least 50%, medium scratches by maybe 20%, and pretty much nothing for deep scratches which I is what I expected. Sadly it did not completely remove my light scratches, but maybe I need to do a few more applications of it. However it did a very good job at removing swirls and water marks. I'll have to give it 3 stars just because it's a fairly expensive product for the performance it offers. If you want to remove swirls, watermarks, and extremely light scratches, then I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Neur0n

customer_reviews.title: Really Worked
customer_reviews.text: Just had a chance to try this product. I am IMPRESSED. I’ve tried several scratch removers in the past and was not at all impressed, so I really wasn’t expecting much.. To my surprise it far exceeded my expectations, I wish I had taken pictures of before and after. You can’t even see the scratch now.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me at all
customer_reviews.text: I would like to know what kind of blemishes/ scratches this fixes? It didn't achieve anything for me. It didn't reduce any scratches on my car at all, not even the light ones. I also had paint (?) on the car door (not sure from what) and no amount of buffing/ elbow grease reduced that by even a tiny bit. I ended up returning it. Maybe if you had a better buffer instrument you might achieve better results (I used the included pad). Maybe if you have other products or equipment to use in conjunction with this it would work. For me, who didn't have any extra tools or knowledge, this did me no good. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfberry

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Did not remove the most minute, minor scratch. Not worth the money. I'm not sure where all of the before and after pictures posted stating it removed scratches are coming from.
customer_reviews.author: dereck

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Average
customer_reviews.text: I had a lease that needed to be returned and so I wanted to minimize the appearance of scratches. Lots of little ones and one deep one. I knew it wouldn't work on the deeper one (can feel it with your fingernail) but I wouldn't say it was great on the others. Even some surface swirls. It absolutely lessened their appearance but by no means did it eliminate them. I followed the instructions to the T. Onto the next product.
customer_reviews.author: SimpsonsTX

customer_reviews.title: Works well for superficial scratches
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I read the reviews and bought this product! I have a black car that has had some superficial scratches on the driver's side door and the hood. This product did not address the deeper scratches on door, but it definitely made a difference on the more superficial scratches. It only took a few minutes to see results and I am happy that I bought it. I will be using this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for swirls!
customer_reviews.text: Product works VERY WELL on swirls, but not so much on light scratches - it made the swirls disappear, but still faint visibility of scratches. I wasn’t expecting a miracle, but these are scratches that you can’t feel with a fingernail, so was hoping for a little more. The 4 stars though, are for the amazing job it did on the swirls caused by frequent drive-thru washing - great!!
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all!!
customer_reviews.text: I should listen to those negative feedbacks. Does not work at all. Yes. No matter major scratch or minor. Can’t remove single of them. Totally waste money. If someone has fluke mind. Please read all those negative feedback. Don’t trust those fake comments
customer_reviews.author: Jarven Lei

customer_reviews.title: ¡¡¡ Not The Best !!!!! READ UPDATE ¡¡
customer_reviews.text: This really didn’t help that much, I try many times to remove really small scratches. And just few of them were remove but after I washed the car the little scratches show off again. This product definitely not the best ! (IT JUST AS A COMPOUND IN A WAY) UPDATE: They issued a full refund of the product to me, that’s very polite of them. Since their product wasn’t efficient to me.
customer_reviews.author: Wilmi Nolasco

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My wife put 3 scratches about 4 inches long on the black paint of our car with her fingernails. I washed and dried the car and used the sponge provided to apply the scratch remover. I then wiped it off with a soft clean towel. I repeated this process 2 more times and the scratch is 99% gone. It took about 15 minutes. I also used it on some minor scratches around my door handles on my blue truck and it took them right off. I had low expectations but this product really does the job! I would recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: I have very mixed feeling about this scratch remover, it does fade scratches, but just a little bit. I wouldn't recommend it though, it work ok for light color cars, but if the color is bright ( we have blue metallic car) it will not make a big difference. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Point blank, if you have some minor scratches on your car, this stuff will get it out in 15 seconds... It's unreal! I had some surface scratches on my new car from my keys on the groove underneath the driver side door handle and on the top of the trunk. After getting my car washed, I did exactly as the directions said on the bottle and I watched those scratches, quite literally, vanish. There isn't a trace of those scratches, at least as far as the normal eye can see. This is a miracle product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Holy poop! This stuff works!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo a concrete support structure totally jumped out and attacked my car. Totally unprovoked. As you can see, my car limped away with some pretty significant abrasions. I bought this scratch removing agent thinking,” Psssshhhh...sure. This’ll work. Whatever. I’ll go ahead, buy this stuff, and proceed to make a nice little fire with my hard earned cash.” Much to my chagrin this stuff actually works. I had to really work on it because those scratches from me hitting...I mean...um... from the structure attacking my car were pretty deep. All is well and good now. Most of the scratches are gone and my car can now drive merrily along.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything to the scratches on my car. I was really very hopeful when I bought it due to lots of good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Marky

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last but customer service 100%
customer_reviews.text: Did help any of the scratches. At first it did look like it was then within a day the scratches were back. I wish this would of worked for me :/ not sure if I did something wrong and may work for some one else. Update: the company contacted me and issued me a full refund since the stuff didn’t work for me. It could very well work for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: cheers

customer_reviews.title: It is good to remove scratches that leave blemishes in your car ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described. It is not a permanent solution. After heavy rain or a car wash, the scratch might be noticeable again (this is not a scratch you can feel when touching it by the way, but did scrabble the car finish). However, I have noticed that after multiple uses the scratch has become less noticeable. It is good to remove scratches that leave blemishes in your car such as the ones done by a snow remover brush or a car while parking. Those are gone for good!
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: For Paint trading, this stuff worked beyond expectations !
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about anything that 'claims' to remove scratches and paint from Vehicles, but was pleasantly surprised after rubbing this stuff in for about 3 mins. It actually worked! My SUV with a silver paint job looks good-as-new! Only a 'slight mark on the black wheel-well that won't come off completely, but you have to get next to it and stare to see it. Otherwise, it worked PERFECTLY! I highly recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Verified Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Worked on tailights
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product, but this past weekend, I got was bug spray (or sunscreen?) residue on my taillights. No matter what I did, the stains wouldn't come off. I tried wiping it with a microfiber towel, wet wipes, cleaning solution, etc. So as my last resort, I used this buffer. After applying a couple drops and using some elbow grease for about 5 minutes, the stain disappeared! I'm not sure how it works on microscratches on the paint, but this definitely got the stains off my taillights~
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: It only worked on very small scratches but it doesn’t work on the rest. It also left marks on my car.
customer_reviews.author: shabi

customer_reviews.title: Scratch Remover Review
customer_reviews.text: The product definitely made progress in removing the Scratch in my RV. It was a "Clear Coat Scratch Only" scratch and couldn't be detected with the "fingernail" test. However, it didn't remove the scratch completely and although improved, the scratch is still visible. I also used a common off the shelf clear coat rubbing compound/polish and it seemed worked just as well. I going to try again with an electric buffer to see if that works better. I recommend this product but it's no miracle cure.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony H. Robitzsch

customer_reviews.title: HUSBAND IS HAPPY..I AM HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband to use when he notices a slight scratch on one of our vehicles. He has SOOOO many products claiming to remove scratches..he said this is the BEST out of all of the products he has in his "collection". He is extremely particular about our vehicles and if he says it is the BEST, it has to be if he is happy with the results. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: A mystery person hit my car in a parking lot while I was shopping. Luckily, a bystander took a picture of their tag and went into the store to find me. I got $500 from the hit/run person. Since the damage was mainly to the paint and my car is old, I kept the money and bought this. They original scrape looked incredibly bad. After using the TriNova Scratch Swirl Remover on the scrape, you can barely tell anything happened. Much better than spending $$$ on a new paint job.
customer_reviews.author: Hollyzilla

customer_reviews.title: It does very well + what you said it will do.
customer_reviews.text: It does very well & also serves as a good wax/polish. Plus it does not do what you said it will not do. By the way, a product named black on black and black to black did great until the first rain. We were told it would last about 100 rains. I know this is a review of TriNova Scratch Swirl Remover, BUT do you have a product better than those named here: If you do, my husband said he would sure help you sell it. After telling everyone around the break table how good BonB &/BtoB are he must go back and say " I am sorry guys". Martha
customer_reviews.author: Martha S.

customer_reviews.title: It works ok, just not as well as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have a black 2015 GMC Sierra and the paint surface was in pretty good shape, but there were some surface scratches in the clear coat that can be seen in sunlight. I applied the product as directed and tried both a machine application and a hand application, and while it does appear to remove some of the surface scratches, it doesn't do the job that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Works well on Surface Scratches
customer_reviews.text: If you can feel your scratch, this is not going to help you. If it's a light scuff or scratch that you can see, but not really feel, then this will do the trick. I had a dog claw my door and left scratches all over it. I was not happy... I tried this out and was stoked! Even to my eye where I notice every little imperfection, the scratches virtually disappeared with this and some elbow grease. I will not say they are 100% gone, but it's very close. I'm happy and will use again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for black cars!
customer_reviews.text: Not worthit. Tried it multiple times. These are not heavy and I have no paint damage. It may have to fo with it being a black car. I would not recommend on black cars.
customer_reviews.author: Sean_N

customer_reviews.title: Worth a Try!
customer_reviews.text: Hit a post and got major paint scratches, was planning on bringing to a body shop before I decided to try this, i was exhausted with all the power I had to put into scrubbing but well worth it since it ALL came off..saved my Aton of money for sure! I have a white van and the area I did clean off paint stayed a lot whiter then rest of van.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for minor scratches and scrapes. I found it very easy to use. Like the item description says, it won't do anything for deep scratches (though I did notice that a quick buff made some of the deeper scratches on my car less noticeable) but I found it to be the perfect solution to the light scratches that inevitably end up on my car from the snow brush and ice scraper each winter.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Use an electric polisher
customer_reviews.text: After my car met untimely with the pillar in my garage, I search of scratch removal kit, and this brand came up first with a lot of good reviews. When I tried using it, I had so-so results with the provided application pad, but I brought out my orbital polisher, and it worked well, leaving just a thin line scratch left in the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Marty C.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have a dark grey car with some surface scratches on the hood of my car. I thought I would have to get it repainted but I just applied this on and boom! Smooth hood on my car! I do reapply every time I wash my car it to keep it looking good. One benefit, I've even used on new scrapes or scratches and it has worked on those too!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: As long as you have reasonable expectations, this product works fantastic. I have a charcoal grey charger with flecks. I had scratches in different places, the worst being multiple scratches from keys...the scratches are gone.I buffed with my hands. I wish I had taken pictures, but I was just testing it out and I got carried away. Off your scratches are small light scratches , this is the right stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Marylin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Accidently scratched my new car with the end of a flag pole ☹ I'm glad I purchased this product. It was easy to use and worked like a charm. The scratch was almost too deep cause I could feel it with my finger nail, but it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of good reviews for this product, that go into great detail. The product works exactly as expected, easy to use, with great results. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: My kids decided to ride their outdoor play car right along my van, and left a large scrape along the side that I was convinced couldn't be removed at home. Before I took the car to a body shop, I wanted to try this. It WORKED! The scrape is completely gone, and the site looks like nothing ever happened. So glad I gave this a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping $ Saver

customer_reviews.title: SCRATCH SWIRL
customer_reviews.text: SORRY IT DID NOT LIVE UP TO THE HIPE... I REALLY TOOK MY TIME DID MY ENTIRE CAR - WAITED 15-MINUTES OR SO, CLEAN CLOTH REMOVED IT MY CAR WAS CLEAN, BUT SCRATCH'S STILL THERE ... VERY DIS-APPOINTING...
customer_reviews.author: Tumbleweed

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was driving in a construction zone and tried to avoid a huge pothole and scrapped a few of those huge orange drums on the right side of the road. There were orange streaks and scratches on the right bumper and right panel above the passenger side tire. Seemed pretty substantial but on further inspection they weren't that deep at all. Tried this product and it took a few applications, about 20 mins and a whole lot of elbow grease but it all came out. Good as knew. As long as the scratch isn't too deep. It will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: UH

customer_reviews.title: Scratch Remover
customer_reviews.text: My son used the product to remove a scratch on driver's side of car but unfortunately no matter how much my son rubbed or tried the scratches did not disappear it may be a good product but it didn't work for me
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Works Briefly
customer_reviews.text: I thought this stuff was great when I first applied it. Scuffs seemed to disappear. Unfortunately when I checked the next day it was back to where it was. Does not last for more than a day.
customer_reviews.author: K. John

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: See the pictures and they show the end results. Took care of little scratches that I couldn’t feel with my finger. Buff them out and makes a difference. Definitely not a complete scratch remover but makes them look 95% better. I just bought a 2017 Acura RDX and it had a little scratches I was able to get rid of with the product. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!...for
customer_reviews.text: No use beating around the bush, this product is ONLY for light scratches, (hairline thin, scuffs) it really does what it advertise, I aas really happy how it removed some unsightly scratches off our car. It WON’T do much of a help with deep scratches - like those deep door key gouges/scratch done by the disgruntled ex-gf, those kind of scratches needs to be touched-up by a professional.
customer_reviews.author: kjneil77

customer_reviews.title: good for minor scratchs and a while.
customer_reviews.text: Might be good for a while if you don't wash your car. It really didn't work for me. It lightened up the scratch on my BMW but it didn't really work so well. You just need to be careful when you wash your car. Make sure the temperate is not so high, it might reduce the effect. Overall, does not last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dear MR.J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used Tesla Model S with a noticeable scuff mark on the passenger side door. It didn't feel like a scratch so I tried this product out to remove it. Following directions and with only a slight amount of pressure, I was able to completely remove the scuff mark and now my 3 year old car looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Davison

customer_reviews.title: Great water spot remover
customer_reviews.text: This product does an incredible job removing water spots and reducing visibility of minor scratches. I got it to remove waterspots on the hood and ended up doing the whole car because it was so easy and I was really happy with the result (and that's by hand). It's great that it comes with an applicator. Picture is of my 2012 ford roof. Huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: karin

customer_reviews.title: Beyond impressed and extremely happy!
customer_reviews.text: First off, let me say that I’m not always one to write reviews. But I just finished using this amazing product and I literally said to myself, “I HAVE to write a review!” A few months ago, my crazy (but lovable) puppy jumped up on the side of my pickup and put scratches down the side of it. It’s a lease. Ugh. I bought this hoping that it would at least make them, uhh, less noticeable lol. They are GONE and it only took me like 5 minutes. My only negative is that I wish I had bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jean

customer_reviews.title: does wonders
customer_reviews.text: I've been thoroughly impressed with this product. I had several scratches on the trunk of my chevy cruze. I applied a coat or 2 and it did wonders. obviously this product is not for deep scratches. but if you have any small scratches that don't go beyond the clear coat, then this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. My wife and I bought a new Camry a few days ago and I hit a rubber bumper to a cargo van. Of course, I'm upset and I found this product and used it today and while it couldn't remove very little of the scruff it removed most of it! What a life saver now you can't even see the damage unless you go very close to the bumper. I recommend trying this first before wasting your money at a shop.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G.

customer_reviews.title: OMG, it's a must buy. work so well.
customer_reviews.text: I was so sad when a cardboard hit my the side of my car and scratch my side doors. A dealer rep told me just to buy a compound buffer to buff it off. Cheaper than trying to get the car repaint. So I found this one on amazon and it did amazing job. I couldn't even tell the scratch were there anymore. it's like my car never scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden L.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective
customer_reviews.text: Hit the gas instead of brakes while I was waiting for my garage door to open all the way and got these lovely scratches on my hood. Bought this product and it took me about five minutes and hardly any elbow grease for these results. The scratches it did not get out were deep enough that I could feel them when I pass my finger over them so I was not expecting them all to come out. Quite pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Karbear

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Got an older Toyota Carolla for my daughter. The paint was in great condition but there were many scratches all over. After using this product most of the small defects were completely gone! It left an amazing shine and the surface felt buttery smooth. I have used many Trinova products and have been happy with every purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works well, takes elbow grease!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this. I have a brand new car that got scratched in a working garage. This scratch was about over a foot long....anyway, I read about this and gave it a shot. At first, I didn’t think it was working. I kept buffing and realized it was disappearing! It took a lot of elbow grease, but my scratch is completely gone. This definitely saved me $500!
customer_reviews.author: An0nymous

customer_reviews.title: I hoped but was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very optimistic that this product would take care of the scratches, but it work very poorly! Not worth the money or the investment. There are better products out there that do a much more better job
customer_reviews.author: Chad Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it - took the marks out.
customer_reviews.text: We used this scratch remover to fix a white paint “mark/scratch” on our VW Tiguan. Prior to using this we tried buffing our the mark using some different products and nothing worked. After following the directions on the bottle we got the majority off the car! All that remains is a scratch that probably needs to be repainted. Overall it worked well and I’d recommend giving this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Rovert Doog

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but this is so worth it. I wish I had taken pics. I bought a Honda Accord a few years ago used and it had a long scratch on the left passenger door when I bought it. I recently got an estimate to fix it and it was $1100. So I thought I would give this a try first. It worked!!! The scratch is barely visible, you have to be standing right next to it and look for it. My husband couldn’t even find the old scratch! My car looks like new!!
customer_reviews.author: June Jennings

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the product when I ordered it but was desperate enough to try it. My other half tried to squeeze through a tight spot on 2way street that should be a one way and a parked car had it wheels turned and scraped the dog leg panel and bumper leaving nasty long black marks on the car and this product was able to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Against all odds, it works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I had reservations when I got this for a 14 inch scrape in my wife's new car. I was thinking it'd be worth trying before spending $500+ to have the pain redone. It worked incredibly with basically no work. Oddly enough, I got a scratch on my car 2 weeks later and it knocked that one right out too. 2 cars saved with 90% of the bottle remaining. This won't work with super deep scratches but works wonders for minor to medium scuffs!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The weather is cold in Ohio, but I decided to give this a try anyways. This product worked really well on my black 2017 Dodge Charger. I did have to use a polisher afterwards but that is what I get for having a black car. I only used it in a small area, but I can’t wait to use it on the rest of my car! It made a huge difference in eliminating the swirls from my bad drying habits.
customer_reviews.author: RobertD

customer_reviews.title: Made my car look much better after applying
customer_reviews.text: My car got a big black scratches in the front left side in a public parking garage. I got this product and just followed the instruction. The result is incredible, most of the black scratches got removed. I also gave it to my sister when her car scratched and she is happy about it too. I think the product can remove the scratches nicely if it caused by the coating left from the other car. However, if the scratches is caused by the coating lost from your car, it might not work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Roaster in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: I don’t write reviews
customer_reviews.text: Like my headline states, I rarely write reviews. But this product worked so fast and so quickly. I wish they had a spot for pictures. My wife's car was hit while parked. 3 scuff marks. This took it right out. I took before and after pics to show my wife and it was so hard to take the after pics because I couldn’t remember where the scuffs were it worked that well! A definite buy and money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: gjones242473

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mercedes with black metallic paint. I have used this product on several areas with good results. The instructions on the product are clear however: If the scratch can be felt with the fingernail, it's probably too deep for good results. Honest company and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: david engstrom

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: I tried it the day after I had washed the car but It did not remove light scratches on my car.
customer_reviews.author: James MX

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I washed the car and used as directed. After wiping off several times it left a permanent haze on my 30 thousand dollar truck. Now I need to spend thousands of dollars to fix what this product did. It ate away ate my clear coat. Truck is black.
customer_reviews.author: chad b.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I think this product works well, it was able to clear many minor scratches on my car and I really like it. It wowed me. Though I haven’t tried any other scratch removers out there, there may be something better than this out there but I like the result this one gave my car. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: One Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light scratches “bye bye”
customer_reviews.text: I do windshield installation and bought for customers vehicles to help them out when I see any light key scratches around the door handle or elsewhere. I love their expression when I show them, usually catch some tips for helping them so I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not really work
customer_reviews.text: I had some really minor scratches on my car and this remover thing did not really cover up those scratches. As a matter of fact, I couldn't see much difference after using the product. Am I missing something?
customer_reviews.author: Koala

customer_reviews.title: It fixed the job and shows no scratches
customer_reviews.text: It was a significant scuff mark. I applied it and buffed by hand three times. Each time the problem disappeared a little more. By the third time it was totally gone. Easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: David Hale Hand

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at how well this worked. The applicator is a little janky - but the product did well in covering up the scratched my 6-year old put in the hood of my car. Used an orbital buffer, with a microfiber bonnet. I can really only see the scratches at a specific angle, and only because I know they're there...
customer_reviews.author: Jason F. Mallas

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to use, but will not work if the scratch is deep intonthe vehicle's body
customer_reviews.text: Forgot to take a before and after picture, but works great, easy to use, and it has a crazy fast delivery when you buy this item... got it almost immediately and received a picture of when it was actually dropped off on my house front door
customer_reviews.author: Juan M. Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this product. It removed a lot more dings & scratches than I thought it would. The trick that has worked for me is to use a couple of thumbnail's worth of it and then rub it in alternating between circular and up & down/side to side motions
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Damn
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought it to remove scratches on my hood. It does not remove the scratch itself if you see white color on it. However, I was able to notice it brings back the clear paint color (All the water marks, some of the swirl marks, and other paint defects were removed). I was pretty impressed and used it on entire surface of my car with a buff pad. I was pretty satisfied with the result, it looked as if my entire car has been level 1 polished !
customer_reviews.author: Noah Kim

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work at all for me. I have some surface level scratches on my car that I was hoping to remove, or at least diminish. I followed the instructions and this literally did nothing. Maybe it's only for teeny tiny marks, but this was useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Hennington

customer_reviews.title: Fake reviews, it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: All the pictures in the reviews have to be fake, I applied to a small scratch, scratch was surface only no indentation, I did not do anything, it’s just a regular car wax.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I feel like ya either give this product a 5-star rating because it worked, or a 1-star because it didn’t. Well, I had a few minor minor scratches from some tree branches that scraped along my car on a narrow country road. You can only see the scratches in certain light, real faint. This stuff did nothing after a few tries.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: i had bought a new 2019 car and asked a guy to tint my windows. while it was done i saw the guy had scratched some areas around the door so i was mad and atleast got a free tint job but that doesnt help with the scratch on my car. i ended buying this product to give it a try and it actually worked. i followed instructions and it actually worked! i dont see any of the scratches anymore note: my car is black so that mightve helped out a bit since other reviews have had an easy process
customer_reviews.author: Ronin.

customer_reviews.title: Results are unreal!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders! Now if you can feel the scratch with your finger it won’t fix it. Like if the paint is chipped off it won’t repair that. I had scraped the pillar in my garage and i really wish I took a before photo, it worked wonders. Now there’s a silver where the paint is gone that it obviously didn’t fix, but the majority of the damage is now gone! Definitely worth the money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really does work!
customer_reviews.text: This scratch remover really work. Unfortunately, I scratched the aide of our family car along a pole. I bought this and applied as directed. It improved the scratch at least 75%. This bottle will last a long time, as well. Recommend everyone has a bottle of this stuff on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Macy

product_meta.title: TriNova Scratch Swirl remover - best abrasive compound car paint restoration. Kit includes buffer pad removal polish in a complete system. Ultimate Solution clear coat care. 12oz
feature_bullets: ✅ A SIMPLE SOLUTION - our advanced formula works when buffing by hand or with a dual action orbital polisher. This means you don't need a high maintenance tool or polisher just to touch up basic auto body spots. Polishes oxidation after cleaning, all cars can shine again after blemish correction.

✅ PAINT RESTORATION - Our product is safe to use on all paint colors. This rubbing compound will remove unwanted swirls, scuffs, paint transfers, water spots, oxidation and other contaminants. Restore your paint's original shine!

✅ HIGH END CHEMICALS - Get the best with TriNova! We believe in uncompromised care, meaning we only use the best chemicals when formulating a product. Automobile exterior color scratches need detailing to get out, our brilliant polishers will repair glaze to a high gloss.

✅ BE SENSIBLE - If you can feel the scratch with the tip of your fingernail, it is too deep or heavy to be repaired with a simple polishing compound. You will need professional repair work to get your supreme finish back. Head to a bodyshop that you trust and ask them to supply rates for a scuff restore job. Painted surfaces and coats can all be restored to brilliance with industrial surface compounds.

✅ TRUST TRINOVA - We're part Gold Eagle Co., an 85 year old company located in Chicago that specializes in automotive. Our reviews are authentic and we understand that these types of products aren't magic in a bottle. If you aren't satisfied with your purchase, we'll refund your money.
